title: "Data Catalog Overview"

## Available Datasets

The OmicIDX data warehouse contains the following datasets:

## SRA (Sequence Read Archive)

**Source**: NCBI Sequence Read Archive  
**Records**: ~30M experiments, ~40M runs  
**Update Frequency**: Daily

Contains:
- Studies (SRP*)
- Experiments (SRX*)
- Runs (SRR*)
- Samples (SRS*)

[Browse SRA Data →](sra/index.qmd)

## GEO (Gene Expression Omnibus)

**Source**: NCBI Gene Expression Omnibus  
**Records**: ~7M samples, ~260K series, ~30K platforms  
**Update Frequency**: Daily

Contains:
- Samples (GSM*)
- Series (GSE*)
- Platforms (GPL*)
- GEOmetadb compatibility views

[Browse GEO Data →](geo/index.qmd)

## BioSample

**Source**: NCBI BioSample, EBI BioSample  
**Records**: ~40M (NCBI) + ~10M (EBI) samples  
**Update Frequency**: Daily

Contains:
- Sample metadata
- Characteristics
- Relationships

[Browse BioSample Data →](biosample/index.qmd)

## BioProject

**Source**: NCBI BioProject  
**Records**: ~800K projects  
**Update Frequency**: Daily

Contains:
- Project metadata
- Descriptions
- Links to related data

[Browse BioProject Data →](bioproject/index.qmd)

## Data Catalog JSON

The complete machine-readable catalog is available at:

```
https://store.yourdomain.com/catalog.json
```

This catalog contains:
- List of all tables
- Schema information (columns, types, descriptions)
- File locations (parquet file URLs)
- Dataset metadata
- Update timestamps

## Schema Organization

Data is organized into schemas:

- **`bronze`** - Staging tables with cleaned, standardized data
- **`geometadb`** - GEOmetadb compatibility views
- **`marts`** - Analytics-ready tables (if available)

## Access Methods

All datasets can be accessed via:

1. [Remote DuckDB Database](../getting-started/remote-database.qmd) - Recommended
2. [Direct Parquet Queries](../getting-started/direct-parquet.qmd) - Alternative
